procedure.title: Request for Tenders for the provision of Archival Cataloguing and Physical Arrangement of Historical Records for the Military Archives.
procedure.description: In summary, the Services comprise: The provision of professional archival services, specifically consisting of: the removal from Cathal Brugha Barracks, Dublin, via suitably secure means; the offsite archival cataloguing and physical arrangement (adhering to ISAD (G) and IGAD descriptive standards and all other professional archival practices and standards) at a suitably secure location; and delivery to the Military Archives, Cathal Brugha Barracks, Dublin, via suitably secure means, of historical army medical corps files.

lots.title: Request for Tenders for the provision of Archival Cataloguing and Physical Arrangement of Historical Records for the Military Archives.
lots.description: In summary, the Services comprise: The provision of professional archival services, specifically consisting of: the removal from Cathal Brugha Barracks, Dublin, via suitably secure means; the offsite archival cataloguing and physical arrangement (adhering to ISAD (G) and IGAD descriptive standards and all other professional archival practices and standards) at a suitably secure location; and delivery to the Military Archives, Cathal Brugha Barracks, Dublin, via suitably secure means, of historical army medical corps files.
